name: Dragoon Spirit
effects: Increase damage dealt by jump attacks by 150%
Increase resistance to Fire, Ice and Lightning by 30%

name: Dragoon Spirit

desc_short: Boost damage dealt by jump abilities and fire, ice, and lightning resistance by 30%

Aug. les dégâts des attaques sautées et la rés. feu/glace/foudre de 30%
Erhöht Schaden von Sprungangriffen und Feuer-, Eis-, und Blitzresistenz um 30%.

desc_long: Boosts damage dealt by jump abilities and fire, ice, and lightning resistance by 30%.
提高跳躍系能力的傷害數值，同時提高30%火冰雷屬性耐性的數值。
점프 계열 어빌리티 피해량이 상승하고, 불, 얼음, 번개속성 저항력이 30% 상승합니다.
